<<<<<<< HEAD
The island princess, or, The generous Portugal a comedy, as it is acted at the Theatre Royal by His Majesties servants. Fletcher, John, 1579-1625.
With the alterations and new additional scenes.
[2], 75, [1] p.
Printed for H.R. and A.M., and are to be sold by William Cademan and Robert Pask, London : 1669.
"By Fletcher only"-Fleay, Biog. chron. Eng. drama. Cf. also Camb. hist. Eng. lit., v. 6, p. 157. Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
